title: Mercantilism's influence on French foreign pol

content.question: Directions: Suggested planning and writing time - 35 minutes.In writing your essay, use specific examples to support your answer.Analyze the influence of the theory of mercantilism on the domestic and foreign policies of France, 1600-1715.

frqParts.text: Directions: Suggested planning and writing time - 35 minutes.In writing your essay, use specific examples to support your answer.Analyze the influence of the theory of mercantilism on the domestic and foreign policies of France, 1600-1715.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
